title: Wood Harris | Ep 111 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Wood Harris | Ep 111 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Legendary actor Wood Harris joins the boys on ATS to discuss his Hollywood career, including The Wire, Remember The Titans, and the current Laker's series he is working on. Plus, he talks current NBA season and favorite players.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
